id: upgrading
title: Upgrading to new versions
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: Upgrading to new versions of React Native will give you access to more APIs, views, developer tools and other goodies. Upgrading requires a small amount of effort, but we try to make it straightforward for you.

translations.zh-hant: 升級至新版本的 React Native 將讓您獲得更多 API、視圖元件、開發者工具和其他優質功能。升級過程需要一些努力，但我們會盡量使其直觀簡便。

segments.source_content: ## Expo projects

translations.zh-hant: ## Expo 專案

segments.source_content: Upgrading your Expo project to a new version of React Native requires updating the `react-native`, `react`, and `expo` package versions in your `package.json` file. Expo provides an `upgrade` command to handle upgrading these and any other known dependencies for you. See the [Upgrading Expo SDK Walkthrough](https://docs.expo.dev/workflow/upgrading-expo-sdk-walkthrough/) for up-to-date information about upgrading your project.

translations.zh-hant: 要將 Expo 專案升級至新版本的 React Native，需更新 `package.json` 中的 `react-native`、`react` 和 `expo` 套件版本。Expo 提供 `upgrade` 指令來自動處理這些核心套件與相關依賴的升級。詳見 [Expo SDK 升級指南](https://docs.expo.dev/workflow/upgrading-expo-sdk-walkthrough/) 以獲取最新的專案升級資訊。

segments.source_content: ## React Native projects

translations.zh-hant: ## React Native 專案

segments.source_content: Because typical React Native projects are essentially made up of an Android project, an iOS project, and a JavaScript project, upgrading can be rather tricky. There's currently two ways for upgrading your React Native project: by using [React Native CLI](https://github.com/react-native-community/cli) or manually with [Upgrade Helper](https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/).

translations.zh-hant: 由於典型的 React Native 專案本質上由 Android 專案、iOS 專案和 JavaScript 專案組成，升級過程可能較為複雜。目前有兩種升級方式：使用 [React Native CLI](https://github.com/react-native-community/cli) 或透過 [Upgrade Helper](https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/) 手動升級。

segments.source_content: ### React Native CLI

translations.zh-hant: ### React Native CLI

segments.source_content: The [React Native CLI](https://github.com/react-native-community/cli) comes with `upgrade` command that provides a one-step operation to upgrade the source files with a minimum of conflicts, it internally uses [rn-diff-purge](https://github.com/react-native-community/rn-diff-purge) project to find out which files need to be created, removed or modified.

translations.zh-hant: [React Native CLI](https://github.com/react-native-community/cli) 內建的 `upgrade` 指令提供一步式操作，能以最小衝突升級原始碼檔案。其內部使用 [rn-diff-purge](https://github.com/react-native-community/rn-diff-purge) 專案來識別需新增、刪除或修改的檔案。

segments.source_content: #### 1. Run the `upgrade` command

translations.zh-hant: #### 1. 執行 `upgrade` 指令

segments.source_content: > The `upgrade` command works on top of Git by using `git apply` with 3-way merge, therefore it's required to use Git in order for this to work, if you don't use Git but still want to use this solution then you can check out how to do it in the [Troubleshooting](#i-want-to-upgrade-with-react-native-cli-but-i-dont-use-git) section.

translations.zh-hant: > `upgrade` 指令基於 Git 的 `git apply` 三方合併機制運作，因此必須使用 Git 才能生效。若未使用 Git 但仍想採用此方案，請參閱 [疑難排解](#i-want-to-upgrade-with-react-native-cli-but-i-dont-use-git) 章節的解決方法。

segments.source_content: Run the following command to start the process of upgrading to the latest version:

translations.zh-hant: 執行以下指令開始升級至最新版本：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native upgrade
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_a89b882e

segments.source_content: You may specify a React Native version by passing an argument, e.g. to upgrade to `0.61.0-rc.0` run:

translations.zh-hant: 可透過參數指定 React Native 版本，例如升級至 `0.61.0-rc.0`：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native upgrade 0.61.0-rc.0
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_b017063d

segments.source_content: The project is upgraded using `git apply` with 3-way merge, it may happen that you'll need to resolve a few conflicts after it's finished.

translations.zh-hant: 專案升級過程採用 `git apply` 三方合併，完成後可能需要解決部分衝突。

segments.source_content: #### 2. Resolve the conflicts

translations.zh-hant: #### 2. 解決衝突

segments.source_content: Conflicted files include delimiters which make very clear where the changes come from. For example:

translations.zh-hant: 衝突檔案會包含明確標示變更來源的分隔符號，例如：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_026f2f3e

segments.source_content: You can think of "ours" as "your team" and "theirs" as "the React Native development team".

translations.zh-hant: 可將 "ours" 視為「您的團隊」，"theirs" 視為「React Native 開發團隊」。

segments.source_content: ### Upgrade Helper

translations.zh-hant: ### Upgrade Helper

segments.source_content: The [Upgrade Helper](https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/) is a web tool to help you out when upgrading your apps by providing the full set of changes happening between any two versions. It also shows comments on specific files to help understanding why that change is needed.

translations.zh-hant: [Upgrade Helper](https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/) 是協助升級應用的網頁工具，提供任意兩個版本間完整的變更集合，並在特定檔案附加註解說明變更原因。

segments.source_content: #### 1. Select the versions

translations.zh-hant: #### 1. 選擇版本

segments.source_content: You first need to select from and to which version you wish to upgrade, by default the latest major versions are selected. After selecting you can click the button "Show me how to upgrade".

translations.zh-hant: 首先需選擇要從哪個版本升級至哪個版本（預設選取最新主要版本），點擊「Show me how to upgrade」按鈕後會顯示升級指引。

segments.source_content: 💡 Major updates will show a "useful content" section on the top with links to help you out when upgrading.

translations.zh-hant: 💡 主要版本升級時，頂部會顯示「實用內容」區塊，包含升級輔助連結。

segments.source_content: #### 2. Upgrade dependencies

translations.zh-hant: #### 2. 升級依賴套件

segments.source_content: The first file that is shown is the `package.json`, it's good to update the dependencies that are showing in there. For example, if `react-native` and `react` appears as changes then you can install it in your project by running `yarn add`:

translations.zh-hant: 首先顯示的是 `package.json` 檔案，建議更新其中標示的依賴套件。例如若顯示 `react-native` 和 `react` 變更，可執行 `yarn add` 安裝：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_9f4336b3

segments.source_content: #### 3. Upgrade your project files

translations.zh-hant: #### 3. 升級專案檔案

segments.source_content: The new release may contain updates to other files that are generated when you run `npx react-native init`, those files are listed after the `package.json` in the Upgrade Helper page. If there aren't other changes then you only need to rebuild the project to continue developing.

translations.zh-hant: 新版本可能包含對執行 `npx react-native init` 時生成的其他文件的更新，這些文件會列在 Upgrade Helper 頁面的 `package.json` 之後。如果沒有其他變更，您只需重新建置專案即可繼續開發。

segments.source_content: In case there are changes then you can either update them manually by copying and pasting from the changes in the page or you can do it with the React Native CLI upgrade command by running:

translations.zh-hant: 若有變更，您可以手動從頁面上的變更內容複製貼上進行更新，或是透過執行以下 React Native CLI 升級指令來完成：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native upgrade
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5782e280

segments.source_content: This will check your files against the latest template and perform the following:

translations.zh-hant: 此指令會將您的文件與最新模板進行比對，並執行以下操作：

segments.source_content:
- If there is a new file in the template, it is created.
- If a file in the template is identical to your file, it is skipped.
- If a file is different in your project than the template, you will be prompted; you have options to keep your file or overwrite it with the template version.

translations.zh-hant:
- 若模板中有新文件，則會建立該文件。
- 若模板中的文件與您的文件完全相同，則會跳過。
- 若專案中的文件與模板不同，系統會提示您選擇保留原文件或覆寫為模板版本。

segments.source_content: > Some upgrades won't be done automatically with the React Native CLI and require manual work, e.g. `0.28` to `0.29`, or `0.56` to `0.57`. Make sure to check the [release notes](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases) when upgrading so that you can identify any manual changes your particular project may require.

translations.zh-hant: > 部分升級無法透過 React Native CLI 自動完成，需手動處理（例如從 `0.28` 升級至 `0.29`，或從 `0.56` 升級至 `0.57`）。升級時請務必查閱[版本發布說明](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases)，以確認專案可能需要的手動調整。

segments.source_content: ### Troubleshooting

translations.zh-hant: ### 疑難排解

segments.source_content: #### I want to upgrade with React Native CLI but I don't use Git

translations.zh-hant: #### 我想使用 React Native CLI 升級，但未使用 Git

segments.source_content: While your project does not have to be handled by the Git versioning system -- you can use Mercurial, SVN, or nothing -- you will still need to [install Git](https://git-scm.com/downloads) on your system in order to use `npx react-native upgrade`. Git will also need to be available in the `PATH`. If your project doesn't use Git, initialize it and commit:

translations.zh-hant: 即使您的專案未使用 Git 版本控制系統（可能使用 Mercurial、SVN 或未使用任何版本控制），仍需在系統中[安裝 Git](https://git-scm.com/downloads) 才能執行 `npx react-native upgrade`。Git 必須可於 `PATH` 中存取。若專案未使用 Git，請初始化並提交：

segments.source_content:
```shell
git init # Initialize a Git repository
git add . # Stage all the current files
git commit -m "Upgrade react-native" # Save the current files in a commit
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_59534425

segments.source_content: After you finish upgrading you may remove the `.git` directory.

translations.zh-hant: 升級完成後可刪除 `.git` 目錄。

segments.source_content: #### I have done all the changes but my app is still using an old version

translations.zh-hant: #### 已完成所有變更，但應用程式仍使用舊版本

segments.source_content: These sort of errors are usually related to caching, it's recommended to install [react-native-clean-project](https://github.com/pmadruga/react-native-clean-project) to clear all your project's cache and then you can run it again.

translations.zh-hant: 此類錯誤通常與快取有關，建議安裝 [react-native-clean-project](https://github.com/pmadruga/react-native-clean-project) 清除專案所有快取，然後重新執行。
